snippet: The Senate voted 98 to 0 on Tuesday to approve a $631 billion defense bill that calls for accelerating the withdrawal of American forces from Afghanistan and tightens sanctions on Iran.
abstract: Senate votes 98 to 0 to approve a $631 billion defense bill that calls for accelerating the withdrawal of American forces from Afghanistan and tightens sanctions on Iran.
lead_paragraph: The Senate voted 98 to 0 on Tuesday to approve a $631 billion defense bill that calls for accelerating the withdrawal of American forces from Afghanistan and tightens sanctions on Iran.
